languages.text: {n}Вы уже разгадали тактику флейтиста. Прислушиваясь к его игре, вы внимательно следите за движениями крысы, и в какой-то момент сами начинаете постукивать пальцем по ящику, вплетая собственный ритм в мелодию парня. Грызун сбивается, принимая ваши команды за команды хозяина, и катит шарик в нужную сторону.{/n}

{n}You have already seen through the flute player's performance. You listen to him play and watch the rat closely. Then, at a certain point, you start tapping your fingers on the edge of the crate, adding your own rhythm to the tune. The rat scrambles in confusion, mistaking your commands for those of its master, and starts rolling the ball toward the goal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы уже разгадали тактику флейтиста. Прислушиваясь к его игре, вы внимательно следите за движениями крысы, и в какой-то момент сами начинаете постукивать пальцем по ящику, вплетая собственный ритм в мелодию парня. Грызун сбивается, принимая ваши команды за команды хозяина, и катит шарик в нужную сторону.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le petit numéro du joueur de flûte n'a déjà plus aucun mystère pour vous. Vous observez attentivement le rat pendant qu'il joue, puis, au bout d'un moment, vous commencez à tapoter la caisse à un autre rythme. Un instant perturbé, le rat prend vos ordres pour ceux de son maître et se met à faire rouler la bille vers le but.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have already seen through the flute player's performance. You listen to him play and watch the rat closely. Then, at a certain point, you start tapping your fingers on the edge of the crate, adding your own rhythm to the tune. The rat scrambles in confusion, mistaking your commands for those of its master, and starts rolling the ball toward the goal.{/n}

Vous observez attentivement le rat pendant qu'il joue, puis, au bout d'un moment, vous commencez à tapoter la caisse à un autre rythme. Un instant perturbé, le rat prend vos ordres pour ceux de son maître et se met à faire rouler la bille vers le but.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ya has calado el numerito del flautista. Le escuchas tocar y observas detenidamente a su rata. Luego, en un momento concreto, empiezas a tamborilear con los dedos en el borde de la caja, añadiendo tu propio ritmo a la melodía. La rata corretea de un lado a otro confusa, interpretando erróneamente tus indicaciones como si fuesen las de su amo, y finalmente hace rodar la bola hasta el orificio rojo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have already seen through the flute player's performance. You listen to him play and watch the rat closely. The rat scrambles in confusion, mistaking your commands for those of its master, and starts rolling the ball toward the goal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}すでにフルート吹きの演奏は見抜いている。男の演奏に耳を傾けつつ、ネズミを注意深く観察した。そしてあるタイミングで、あなたは木箱の縁を指で叩き、曲に自分のリズムを加え始めた。ネズミは混乱でワタワタと動き、こちらの命令を主人の命令と勘違いして、ゴールに向かってボールを転がし始める。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have already seen through the flute player's performance. You listen to him play and watch the rat closely. Then, at a certain point, you start tapping your fingers on the edge of the crate, adding your own rhythm to the tune. The rat scrambles in confusion, mistaking your commands for those of its master, and starts rolling the ball toward the goal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}すでにフルート吹きの演奏は見抜いている。男の演奏に耳を傾けつつ、ネズミを注意深く観察した。そしてあるタイミングで、あなたは木箱の縁を指で叩き、曲に自分のリズムを加え始めた。ネズミは混乱でワタワタと動き、こちらの命令を主人の命令と勘違いして、ゴールに向かってボールを転がし始める。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你早已看穿了吹笛人的表演。你一边听着他的演奏，一遍仔细观察老鼠的动作。之后在某个时间点，你用手指敲打起了箱子边缘，在曲调中加入了你自己的节奏。老鼠一头雾水地到处乱窜，将你的命令误认为主人的命令，把球朝目标的方向推了过去。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have already seen through the flute player's performance. You listen to him play and watch the rat closely. Then, at a certain point, you start tapping your fingers on the edge of the crate, adding your own rhythm to the tune. The rat scrambles in confusion, mistaking your commands for those of its master, and starts rolling the ball toward the goal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hast die Vorstellung des Flötenspielers bereits durchschaut. Du hörst ihm zu und beobachtest dabei genau die Ratte. An einem bestimmten Punkt tippst du dann mit deinen Fingern auf die Kante der Kiste und fügst dem Lied deinen eigenen Rhythmus hinzu. Die Ratte ist verwirrt, verwechselt deine Befehle mit denen seines Herrchens und rollt die Kugel Richtung Tor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Flütçünün gösterisinin iç yüzünü hâlihazırda kavramış bulunuyorsun. Flütü çalışını dinleyip sıçanı yakından izliyorsun. Bir noktadan sonra kasanın kenarına parmaklarını vurarak melodiye kendi ritmini katmaya başlıyorsun. Sıçan, senin komutlarını efendisinin komutlarıyla karıştırarak dikkati dağınık bir şekilde koşuşturmaya ve topu gol çizgisine doğru yuvarlamaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have already seen through the flute player's performance. You listen to him play and watch the rat closely. Then, at a certain point, you start tapping your fingers on the edge of the crate, adding your own rhythm to the tune.
